069@RequiredArgsConstructor
070@Slf4j
071public class SQLQueryVisitor<S extends SearchParameter> implements QueryVisitor {
072
073  private static final String CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR = " AND ";
074  private static final String DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR = " OR ";
075  private static final String EQUALS_OPERATOR = " = ";
076  private static final String IN_OPERATOR = " IN";
077  private static final String GREATER_THAN_OPERATOR = " > ";
078  private static final String GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR = " >= ";
079  private static final String LESS_THAN_OPERATOR = " < ";
080  private static final String LESS_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR = " <= ";
081  private static final String NOT_OPERATOR = "NOT ";
082  private static final String LIKE_OPERATOR = " LIKE ";
083  private static final String IS_NOT_NULL_OPERATOR = " IS NOT NULL";
084  private static final String IS_NULL_OPERATOR = " IS NULL";
085  private static final String IS_NOT_NULL_ARRAY_OPERATOR = "(%1$s IS NOT NULL AND size(%1$s) > 0)";
086  private static final String IS_NULL_ARRAY_OPERATOR = "(%1$s IS NULL OR size(%1$s) = 0)";
087  // where query to execute a select all
088  private static final String ALL_QUERY = "true";
089
090  private static final String SQL_ARRAY_PRE = "ARRAY";
091
092  private static final Function<Term, String> ARRAY_FN =
093      t -> "stringArrayContains(" + SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(t) + ",'%s',%b)";
094
095  private static final Function<Term, String> ARRAY_LIKE_FN =
096      t -> "stringArrayLike(" + SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(t) + ",'%s',%b)";
097
098  private static final List<GbifTerm> NUB_KEYS =
099      ImmutableList.of(
100          GbifTerm.taxonKey,
101          GbifTerm.acceptedTaxonKey,
102          GbifTerm.kingdomKey,
103          GbifTerm.phylumKey,
104          GbifTerm.classKey,
105          GbifTerm.orderKey,
106          GbifTerm.familyKey,
107          GbifTerm.genusKey,
108          // GbifTerm.subgenusKey, Excluded as it is not populated by interpretation.
109          GbifTerm.speciesKey);
110
111  private static final List<GadmTerm> GADM_GIDS =
112      ImmutableList.of(
113          GadmTerm.level0Gid, GadmTerm.level1Gid, GadmTerm.level2Gid, GadmTerm.level3Gid);
114
115  private static final Joiner COMMA_JOINER = Joiner.on(", ").skipNulls();
116
117  private StringBuilder builder;
118
119  private final SQLTermsMapper<S> sqlTermsMapper;
120
121  /** Transforms the value to the SQL statement lower(val). */
122  protected String toSQLLower(String val) {
123    return "lower(" + val + ")";
124  }
125
126  protected String toSQLField(S param, boolean matchCase) {
127    return Optional.ofNullable(term(param))
128        .map(
129            term -> {
130              String sqlCol = SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(term);
131              if (String.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())
132                  && (param != OccurrenceSearchParameter.GEOMETRY)
133                  && !matchCase) {
134                return toSQLLower(sqlCol);
135              }
136              return sqlCol;
137            })
138        .orElseThrow(
139            () ->
140                // QueryBuildingException requires an underlying exception
141                new IllegalArgumentException(
142                    "Search parameter " + param.type().getName() + "." + param + " is not mapped"));
143  }
144
145  /**
146   * Allow support for querying the denormalized extension.
147   *
148   * <p>FIXME - this can probably be factored out once all required fields are denormalized.
149   *
150   * @param param
151   * @param matchCase
152   * @return
153   */
154  protected String toSQLDenormField(S param, boolean matchCase) {
155    return Optional.ofNullable(term(param))
156        .map(
157            term -> {
158              if (term instanceof DwcTerm) {
159                DwcTerm dwcTerm = (DwcTerm) term;
160                String field = "Denorm.parents." + dwcTerm.simpleName();
161                if (String.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())
162                    && !"GEOMETRY".equals(param.name())
163                    && !matchCase) {
164                  return toSQLLower(field);
165                }
166                return field;
167              }
168              return null;
169            })
170        .orElseThrow(
171            () ->
172                // QueryBuildingException requires an underlying exception
173                new IllegalArgumentException(
174                    "Search parameter " + param + " is not mapped to Hive"));
175  }
176
177  /**
178   * Converts a value to the form expected by Hive based on the SearchParameter. Most values pass by
179   * unaltered. Quotes are added for values that need to be quoted, escaping any existing quotes.
180   *
181   * @param param the type of parameter defining the expected type
182   * @param value the original query value
183   * @return the converted value expected by Hive
184   */
185  protected String toSQLValue(S param, String value, boolean matchCase) {
186    if (Enum.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())) {
187      // all enum parameters are uppercase
188      return '\'' + value.toUpperCase() + '\'';
189    }
190
191    if (Date.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())) {
192      // use longs for timestamps expressed as ISO dates
193      LocalDate ld = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDate(value);
194      Instant i = ld.atStartOfDay(ZoneOffset.UTC).toInstant();
195      if (isInterpretedUtcDateMilliseconds(term(param))) {
196        return String.valueOf(i.toEpochMilli());
197      } else {
198        return String.valueOf(i.getEpochSecond());
199      }
200
201    } else if (Number.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())
202        || Boolean.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())) {
203      // do not quote numbers
204      return value;
205
206    } else {
207      // quote value, escape existing quotes
208      String strVal = '\'' + value.replaceAll("'", "\\\\'") + '\'';
209      if (String.class.isAssignableFrom(param.type())
210          && !"GEOMETRY".equals(param.name())
211          && !matchCase) {
212        return toSQLLower(strVal);
213      }
214      return strVal;
215    }
216  }
217
218  /**
219   * Translates a valid {@link org.gbif.api.model.occurrence.Download} object and translates it into
220   * a strings that can be used as the <em>WHERE</em> clause for a SQL (hive or spark) download.
221   *
222   * @param predicate to translate
223   * @return WHERE clause
224   */
225  public String buildQuery(Predicate predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
226    String query = ALL_QUERY;
227    if (predicate != null) { // null predicate means a SELECT ALL
228      builder = new StringBuilder();
229      visit(predicate);
230      query = builder.toString();
231    }
232
233    // Set to null to prevent old StringBuilders hanging around in case this class is reused
234    // somewhere else
235    builder = null;
236    return query;
237  }
238
239  public void visit(ConjunctionPredicate predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
240    visitCompoundPredicate(predicate, CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
241  }
242
243  public void visit(DisjunctionPredicate predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
244    // See if this disjunction can be simplified into an IN predicate, which is much faster.
245    // We could overcomplicate this:
246    //   A=1 OR A=2 OR B=3 OR B=4 OR C>5 → A IN(1,2) OR B IN (3,4) OR C>5
247    // but that's a very unusual query for us, so we just check for
248    // - EqualsPredicates everywhere
249    // - on the same search parameter.
250
251    boolean useIn = true;
252    Boolean matchCase = null;
253    List<String> values = new ArrayList<>();
254    S parameter = null;
255
256    for (Predicate subPredicate : predicate.getPredicates()) {
257      if (subPredicate instanceof EqualsPredicate) {
258        EqualsPredicate<S> equalsSubPredicate = (EqualsPredicate<S>) subPredicate;
259        if (parameter == null) {
260          parameter = equalsSubPredicate.getKey();
261          matchCase = equalsSubPredicate.isMatchCase();
262        } else if (parameter != equalsSubPredicate.getKey()
263            || matchCase != equalsSubPredicate.isMatchCase()) {
264          useIn = false;
265          break;
266        }
267        values.add(equalsSubPredicate.getValue());
268      } else {
269        useIn = false;
270        break;
271      }
272    }
273
274    if (useIn) {
275      visit(new InPredicate<>(parameter, values, matchCase));
276    } else {
277      visitCompoundPredicate(predicate, DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
278    }
279  }
280
281  public Function<Term, String> getArrayFn() {
282    return ARRAY_FN;
283  }
284
285  /** Supports all parameters incl taxonKey expansion for higher taxa. */
286  public void visit(EqualsPredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
287    if (predicate.getKey() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXON_KEY) {
288      appendTaxonFilterList(NUB_KEYS, predicate.getValue());
289    } else if (predicate.getKey() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.GADM_GID) {
290      appendGadmFilterList(GADM_GIDS, predicate.getValue());
291    } else if (predicate.getKey() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.MEDIA_TYPE) {
292      Optional.ofNullable(VocabularyUtils.lookupEnum(predicate.getValue(), MediaType.class))
293          .ifPresent(
294              mediaType ->
295                  builder.append(
296                      String.format(
297                          getArrayFn().apply(GbifTerm.mediaType), mediaType.name(), true)));
298    } else if (predicate.getKey() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.ISSUE) {
299      builder.append(
300          String.format(
301              getArrayFn().apply(GbifTerm.issue), predicate.getValue().toUpperCase(), true));
302    } else if (sqlTermsMapper.isArray(predicate.getKey())) {
303      builder.append(
304          String.format(
305              getArrayFn().apply(sqlTermsMapper.getTermArray(predicate.getKey())),
306              predicate.getValue().replaceAll("'", "\\\\'"),
307              predicate.isMatchCase()));
308    } else if (sqlTermsMapper.isDenormedTerm(predicate.getKey())) {
309      builder
310          .append("(")
311          .append("(")
312          .append(toSQLField(predicate.getKey(), predicate.isMatchCase()))
313          .append(EQUALS_OPERATOR)
314          .append(toSQLValue(predicate.getKey(), predicate.getValue(), predicate.isMatchCase()))
315          .append(") OR (")
316          .append("stringArrayContains(")
317          .append(toSQLDenormField(predicate.getKey(), true))
318          .append(",")
319          .append(toSQLValue(predicate.getKey(), predicate.getValue(), true))
320          .append("))")
321          .append(")");
322    } else if (SQLColumnsUtils.isVocabulary(term(predicate.getKey()))) {
323      builder.append(
324          String.format(getArrayFn().apply(term(predicate.getKey())), predicate.getValue(), false));
325    } else if (Date.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
326      // Dates may contain a range even for an EqualsPredicate (e.g. "2000" or "2000-02")
327      // The user's query value is inclusive, but the parsed dateRange is exclusive of the
328      // upperBound to allow including the day itself.
329      //
330      // I.e. a predicate value 2000/2005-03 gives a dateRange [2000-01-01,2005-04-01)
331      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
332
333      if (dateRange.hasLowerBound() || dateRange.hasUpperBound()) {
334        builder.append('(');
335        if (dateRange.hasLowerBound()) {
336          visitSimplePredicate(
337              predicate,
338              GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR,
339              ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.lowerEndpoint()));
340          if (dateRange.hasUpperBound()) {
341            builder.append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
342          }
343        }
344        if (dateRange.hasUpperBound()) {
345          visitSimplePredicate(
346              predicate, LESS_THAN_OPERATOR, ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.upperEndpoint()));
347        }
348        builder.append(')');
349      }
350    } else if (IsoDateInterval.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
351      // Dates may contain a range even for an EqualsPredicate (e.g. "2000" or "2000-02")
352      // The user's query value is inclusive, but the parsed dateRange is exclusive of the
353      // upperBound to allow including the day itself.
354      //
355      // I.e. a predicate value 2000/2005-03 gives a dateRange [2000-01-01,2005-04-01)
356      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
357
358      if (dateRange.hasLowerBound() || dateRange.hasUpperBound()) {
359        // all the stuff here
360        builder.append('(');
361        if (dateRange.hasLowerBound()) {
362          SimplePredicate predicateGte =
363              new EqualsPredicate<>(
364                  InternalOccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE_GTE,
365                  predicate.getValue(),
366                  predicate.isMatchCase());
367          visitSimplePredicate(
368              predicateGte,
369              GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR,
370              ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.lowerEndpoint()));
371          if (dateRange.hasUpperBound()) {
372            builder.append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
373          }
374        }
375        if (dateRange.hasUpperBound()) {
376          SimplePredicate predicateLte =
377              new EqualsPredicate<>(
378                  InternalOccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE_LTE,
379                  predicate.getValue(),
380                  predicate.isMatchCase());
381          visitSimplePredicate(
382              predicateLte,
383              LESS_THAN_OPERATOR,
384              ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.upperEndpoint()));
385        }
386        builder.append(')');
387      }
388    } else if (predicate.getKey() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.GEOLOGICAL_TIME) {
389      if (SearchTypeValidator.isNumericRange(predicate.getValue())) {
390        Range<Double> range = SearchTypeValidator.parseDecimalRange(predicate.getValue());
391        if (range.hasLowerBound()) {
392          builder
393              .append("geologicaltime.gt")
394              .append(GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR)
395              .append(range.lowerEndpoint());
396        }
397        if (range.hasUpperBound()) {
398          if (range.hasLowerBound()) {
399            builder.append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
400          }
401          builder
402              .append("geologicaltime.lte")
403              .append(LESS_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR)
404              .append(range.upperEndpoint());
405        }
406      } else {
407        builder
408            .append(predicate.getValue())
409            .append(GREATER_THAN_OPERATOR)
410            .append("geologicaltime.gt")
411            .append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR)
412            .append(predicate.getValue())
413            .append(LESS_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR)
414            .append("geologicaltime.lte");
415      }
416    } else {
417      visitSimplePredicate(predicate, EQUALS_OPERATOR);
418    }
419  }
420
421  public void visit(GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
422    if (Date.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
423      // Where the date is a range, consider the "OrEquals" to mean including the whole range.
424      // "2000" includes all of 2000.
425      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
426      visitSimplePredicate(
427          predicate,
428          GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR,
429          ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.lowerEndpoint()));
430    } else if (IsoDateInterval.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
431      // Where the date is a range, consider the "OrEquals" to mean including the whole range.
432      // "2000" includes all of 2000.
433      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
434      SimplePredicate predicateLte =
435          new GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(
436              InternalOccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE_LTE, predicate.getValue());
437      visitSimplePredicate(
438          predicateLte,
439          GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR,
440          ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.lowerEndpoint()));
441    } else {
442      visitSimplePredicate(predicate, GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR);
443    }
444  }
445
446  public void visit(GreaterThanPredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
447    if (Date.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
448      // Where the date is a range, consider the lack of "OrEquals" to mean excluding the whole
449      // range.
450      // "2000" excludes all of 2000, so the earliest date is 2001-01-01.
451      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
452      visitSimplePredicate(
453          predicate,
454          GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR,
455          ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.upperEndpoint()));
456    } else if (IsoDateInterval.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
457      // Where the date is a range, consider the lack of "OrEquals" to mean excluding the whole
458      // range.
459      // "2000" excludes all of 2000, so the earliest date is 2001-01-01.
460      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
461      SimplePredicate predicateLte =
462          new GreaterThanPredicate<>(
463              InternalOccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE_LTE, predicate.getValue());
464      visitSimplePredicate(
465          predicateLte,
466          GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR,
467          ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.upperEndpoint()));
468
469    } else {
470      visitSimplePredicate(predicate, GREATER_THAN_OPERATOR);
471    }
472  }
473
474  public void visit(LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
475    if (Date.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
476      // Where the date is a range, consider the "OrEquals" to mean including the whole range.
477      // "2000" includes all of 2000, so the latest date is 2001-01-01 (not inclusive).
478      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
479      visitSimplePredicate(
480          predicate, LESS_THAN_OPERATOR, ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.upperEndpoint()));
481    } else if (IsoDateInterval.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
482      // Where the date is a range, consider the "OrEquals" to mean including the whole range.
483      // "2000" includes all of 2000, so the latest date is 2001-01-01 (not inclusive).
484      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
485      SimplePredicate predicateGte =
486          new LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(
487              InternalOccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE_GTE, predicate.getValue());
488      visitSimplePredicate(
489          predicateGte, LESS_THAN_OPERATOR, ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.upperEndpoint()));
490    } else {
491      visitSimplePredicate(predicate, LESS_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR);
492    }
493  }
494
495  public void visit(LessThanPredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
496    if (Date.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
497      // Where the date is a range, consider the lack of "OrEquals" to mean excluding the whole
498      // range.
499      // "2000" excludes all of 2000, so the latest date is 2000-01-01 (not inclusive).
500      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
501      visitSimplePredicate(
502          predicate, LESS_THAN_OPERATOR, ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.lowerEndpoint()));
503    } else if (IsoDateInterval.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
504      // Where the date is a range, consider the lack of "OrEquals" to mean excluding the whole
505      // range.
506      // "2000" excludes all of 2000, so the latest date is 2000-01-01 (not inclusive).
507      Range<LocalDate> dateRange = IsoDateParsingUtils.parseDateRange(predicate.getValue());
508      SimplePredicate predicateGte =
509          new LessThanPredicate<>(
510              InternalOccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE_GTE, predicate.getValue());
511      visitSimplePredicate(
512          predicateGte, LESS_THAN_OPERATOR, ISO_DATE_FORMATTER.format(dateRange.lowerEndpoint()));
513    } else {
514      visitSimplePredicate(predicate, LESS_THAN_OPERATOR);
515    }
516  }
517
518  public void visit(RangePredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
519    builder.append("((");
520
521    if (!Objects.isNull(predicate.getValue().getGte())) {
522      visitSimplePredicate(
523          new LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(predicate.getKey(), predicate.getValue().getGte()),
524          GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR);
525    } else {
526      visitSimplePredicate(
527          new LessThanPredicate<>(predicate.getKey(), predicate.getValue().getGt()),
528          GREATER_THAN_OPERATOR);
529    }
530
531    builder.append(")");
532    builder.append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
533    builder.append("(");
534
535    if (!Objects.isNull(predicate.getValue().getLte())) {
536      visitSimplePredicate(
537          new GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(predicate.getKey(), predicate.getValue().getLte()),
538          LESS_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR);
539    } else {
540      visitSimplePredicate(
541          new GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<>(predicate.getKey(), predicate.getValue().getLt()),
542          LESS_THAN_OPERATOR);
543    }
544    builder.append("))");
545  }
546
547  /*
548   * For large disjunctions, IN predicates are around 3× faster than a perfectly balanced tree of
549   * OR predicates, and around 2× faster than a fairly flat OR query.
550   *
551   * With Hive 1.3.0, balancing OR queries should be internal to Hive:
552   *   https://jira.apache.org/jira/browse/HIVE-11398
553   * but it is probably still better to use an IN, which uses a hash table lookup internally:
554   *   https://jira.apache.org/jira/browse/HIVE-11415#comment-14651085
555   */
556  public void visit(InPredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
557
558    log.info("InPredicate " + predicate);
559
560    boolean isMatchCase = Optional.ofNullable(predicate.isMatchCase()).orElse(Boolean.FALSE);
561
562    if (isSQLArray(predicate.getKey()) || SQLColumnsUtils.isVocabulary(term(predicate.getKey()))) {
563      // Array values must be converted to ORs.
564      builder.append('(');
565      Iterator<String> iterator = predicate.getValues().iterator();
566      while (iterator.hasNext()) {
567        // Use the equals predicate to get the behaviour for array.
568        visit(new EqualsPredicate<S>(predicate.getKey(), iterator.next(), isMatchCase));
569        if (iterator.hasNext()) {
570          builder.append(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
571        }
572      }
573      builder.append(')');
574    } else if (predicate.getKey() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXON_KEY) {
575      // Taxon keys must be expanded into a disjunction of in predicates
576      appendTaxonKeyFilter(predicate.getValues());
577    } else if (predicate.getKey() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.GADM_GID) {
578      // GADM GIDs must be expanded into a disjunction of in predicates
579      appendGadmGidFilter(predicate.getValues());
580    } else if (predicate.getKey() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.EVENT_DATE) {
581      // Event dates must be expanded into a disjunction of conjunction predicates (of comparisons)
582      builder.append('(');
583      Iterator<String> iterator = predicate.getValues().iterator();
584      while (iterator.hasNext()) {
585        // Use the equals predicate to get the behaviour for event dates.
586        visit(new EqualsPredicate<S>(predicate.getKey(), iterator.next(), isMatchCase));
587        if (iterator.hasNext()) {
588          builder.append(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
589        }
590      }
591      builder.append(')');
592
593    } else {
594      builder
595          .append('(')
596          .append(toSQLField(predicate.getKey(), isMatchCase))
597          .append(IN_OPERATOR)
598          .append('(');
599      Iterator<String> iterator = predicate.getValues().iterator();
600      while (iterator.hasNext()) {
601        builder.append(toSQLValue(predicate.getKey(), iterator.next(), isMatchCase));
602        if (iterator.hasNext()) {
603          builder.append(", ");
604        }
605      }
606      builder.append(")");
607
608      // this block can be removed in future if we don't need a denormalized
609      // AVRO extension
610      if (sqlTermsMapper.isDenormedTerm(predicate.getKey())) {
611        builder.append(" OR ").append('(');
612
613        Iterator<String> iterator2 = predicate.getValues().iterator();
614        while (iterator2.hasNext()) {
615          builder
616              .append('(')
617              // FIX ME
618              .append("array_contains(")
619              .append(toSQLDenormField(predicate.getKey(), true))
620              .append(',')
621              .append(toSQLValue(predicate.getKey(), iterator2.next(), true))
622              .append(')')
623              .append(')');
624          if (iterator2.hasNext()) {
625            builder.append(" OR ");
626          }
627        }
628        builder.append(")");
629      }
630      builder.append(")");
631    }
632  }
633
634  public void visit(LikePredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
635    if (sqlTermsMapper.isArray(predicate.getKey())) {
636      builder.append(
637          String.format(
638              ARRAY_LIKE_FN.apply(sqlTermsMapper.getTermArray(predicate.getKey())),
639              predicate.getValue().replaceAll("'", "\\\\'"),
640              predicate.isMatchCase()));
641    } else {
642      // Replace % → \% and _ → \_
643      // Then replace * → % and ? → _
644      LikePredicate<S> likePredicate =
645          new LikePredicate<>(
646              predicate.getKey(),
647              predicate
648                  .getValue()
649                  .replace("%", "\\%")
650                  .replace("_", "\\_")
651                  .replace('*', '%')
652                  .replace('?', '_'),
653              predicate.isMatchCase());
654
655      visitSimplePredicate(likePredicate, LIKE_OPERATOR);
656    }
657  }
658
659  public void visit(NotPredicate predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
660    builder.append(NOT_OPERATOR);
661    visit(predicate.getPredicate());
662  }
663
664  public void visit(IsNotNullPredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
665    if (isSQLArray(predicate.getParameter())
666        || SQLColumnsUtils.isVocabulary(term(predicate.getParameter()))) {
667      builder.append(
668          String.format(IS_NOT_NULL_ARRAY_OPERATOR, toSQLField(predicate.getParameter(), true)));
669    } else if (predicate.getParameter() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXON_KEY) {
670      appendUnaryList(NUB_KEYS, IS_NOT_NULL_OPERATOR);
671    } else if (predicate.getParameter() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.GADM_GID) {
672      appendUnaryList(GADM_GIDS, IS_NOT_NULL_OPERATOR);
673    } else {
674      // matchCase: Avoid adding an unnecessary "lower()" when just testing for null.
675      builder.append(toSQLField(predicate.getParameter(), true));
676      builder.append(IS_NOT_NULL_OPERATOR);
677    }
678  }
679
680  public void visit(IsNullPredicate<S> predicate) throws QueryBuildingException {
681    if (predicate.getParameter() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.TAXON_KEY) {
682      appendUnaryList(NUB_KEYS, IS_NULL_OPERATOR);
683    } else if (predicate.getParameter() == OccurrenceSearchParameter.GADM_GID) {
684      appendUnaryList(GADM_GIDS, IS_NULL_OPERATOR);
685    } else {
686      // matchCase: Avoid adding an unnecessary "lower()" when just testing for null.
687      if (isSQLArray(predicate.getParameter())) {
688        builder.append(
689            String.format(IS_NULL_ARRAY_OPERATOR, toSQLField(predicate.getParameter(), true)));
690      } else {
691        builder.append(toSQLField(predicate.getParameter(), true));
692        builder.append(IS_NULL_OPERATOR);
693      }
694    }
695  }
696
697  public void visit(WithinPredicate within) throws QueryBuildingException {
698    JtsSpatialContextFactory spatialContextFactory = new JtsSpatialContextFactory();
699    spatialContextFactory.normWrapLongitude = true;
700    spatialContextFactory.srid = 4326;
701    spatialContextFactory.datelineRule = DatelineRule.ccwRect;
702
703    WKTReader reader =
704        new WKTReader(spatialContextFactory.newSpatialContext(), spatialContextFactory);
705
706    try {
707      // the geometry must be valid - it was validated in the predicates constructor
708      Shape geometry = reader.parse(within.getGeometry());
709
710      builder.append('(');
711      String withinGeometry;
712
713      // Add an additional filter to a bounding box around any shapes that aren't quadrilaterals, to
714      // speed up the query.
715      if (geometry instanceof JtsGeometry
716          && ((JtsGeometry) geometry).getGeom().getNumPoints() != 5) {
717        Geometry g = ((JtsGeometry) geometry).getGeom();
718        // Use the Spatial4J-fixed geometry; this is split into a multipolygon if it crosses the
719        // antimeridian.
720        withinGeometry = g.toText();
721
722        Rectangle bounds = geometry.getBoundingBox();
723        boundingBox(bounds);
724        builder.append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
725
726        // A tool (R?) can generate hundreds of tiny areas spread across the globe, all in a single
727        // multipolygon.
728        // Add bounding boxes for these too.
729        // Example: https://www.gbif.org/occurrence/download/0187894-210914110416597
730        if (g instanceof MultiPolygon && g.getNumGeometries() > 2) {
731          builder.append("((");
732          for (int i = 0; i < g.getNumGeometries(); i++) {
733            if (i > 0) {
734              // Too many clauses exceeds Hive's query parsing stack.
735              if (i % 500 == 0) {
736                builder.append(')');
737                builder.append(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
738                builder.append('(');
739              } else {
740                builder.append(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
741              }
742            }
743            Geometry gi = g.getGeometryN(i);
744            Envelope env = gi.getEnvelopeInternal();
745            boundingBox(
746                new RectangleImpl(
747                    env.getMinX(),
748                    env.getMaxX(),
749                    env.getMinY(),
750                    env.getMaxY(),
751                    geometry.getContext()));
752          }
753          builder.append("))");
754          builder.append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
755        }
756      } else {
757        withinGeometry = within.getGeometry();
758      }
759      builder
760          .append("contains('")
761          .append(withinGeometry)
762          .append("', ")
763          .append(SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(DwcTerm.decimalLatitude))
764          .append(", ")
765          .append(SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(DwcTerm.decimalLongitude));
766      // Without the "= TRUE", the expression may evaluate to TRUE or FALSE for all records,
767      // depending
768      // on the data format (ORC, Avro, Parquet, text) of the table (!).
769      // We could not reproduce the issue on our test cluster, so it seems safest to include this.
770      builder.append(") = TRUE").append(')');
771    } catch (Exception e) {
772      throw new QueryBuildingException(e);
773    }
774  }
775
776  public void visit(GeoDistancePredicate geoDistance) throws QueryBuildingException {
777    builder
778        .append("(geoDistance(")
779        .append(geoDistance.getGeoDistance().getLatitude())
780        .append(", ")
781        .append(geoDistance.getGeoDistance().getLongitude())
782        .append(", '")
783        .append(geoDistance.getGeoDistance().getDistance().toString())
784        .append("', ")
785        .append(SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(DwcTerm.decimalLatitude))
786        .append(", ")
787        .append(SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(DwcTerm.decimalLongitude))
788        .append(") = TRUE)");
789  }
790
791  /**
792   * Given a bounding box, generates greater than / lesser than queries using decimalLatitude and
793   * decimalLongitude to form a bounding box.
794   */
795  private void boundingBox(Rectangle bounds) {
796    builder
797        .append('(')
798        // Latitude is easy:
799        .append(SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(DwcTerm.decimalLatitude))
800        .append(GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR)
801        .append(bounds.getMinY())
802        .append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR)
803        .append(SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(DwcTerm.decimalLatitude))
804        .append(LESS_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR)
805        .append(bounds.getMaxY())
806        .append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR)
807
808        // Longitude must take account of crossing the antimeridian:
809        .append('(')
810        .append(SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(DwcTerm.decimalLongitude))
811        .append(GREATER_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR)
812        .append(bounds.getMinX());
813    if (bounds.getMinX() < bounds.getMaxX()) {
814      builder.append(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
815    } else {
816      builder.append(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
817    }
818    builder
819        .append(SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(DwcTerm.decimalLongitude))
820        .append(LESS_THAN_EQUALS_OPERATOR)
821        .append(bounds.getMaxX())
822        .append(')')
823        .append(')');
824  }
825
826  /**
827   * Builds a list of predicates joined by 'op' statements. The final statement will look like this:
828   *
829   * <p>
830   *
831   * <pre>
832   * ((predicate) op (predicate) ... op (predicate))
833   * </pre>
834   */
835  public void visitCompoundPredicate(CompoundPredicate predicate, String op)
836      throws QueryBuildingException {
837    builder.append('(');
838    Iterator<Predicate> iterator = predicate.getPredicates().iterator();
839    while (iterator.hasNext()) {
840      Predicate subPredicate = iterator.next();
841      builder.append('(');
842      visit(subPredicate);
843      builder.append(')');
844      if (iterator.hasNext()) {
845        builder.append(op);
846      }
847    }
848    builder.append(')');
849  }
850
851  public void visitSimplePredicate(SimplePredicate<S> predicate, String op)
852      throws QueryBuildingException {
853    if (Number.class.isAssignableFrom(predicate.getKey().type())) {
854      if (SearchTypeValidator.isNumericRange(predicate.getValue())) {
855        if (Integer.class.equals(predicate.getKey().type())) {
856          visit(
857              toIntegerRangePredicate(
858                  SearchTypeValidator.parseIntegerRange(predicate.getValue()), predicate.getKey()));
859        } else {
860          visit(
861              toNumberRangePredicate(
862                  SearchTypeValidator.parseDecimalRange(predicate.getValue()), predicate.getKey()));
863        }
864        return;
865      }
866    }
867
868    if (sqlTermsMapper.includeNullInPredicate(predicate)) {
869      String column = SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLColumn(term(predicate.getKey()));
870      builder
871          .append('(')
872          .append(toSQLField(predicate.getKey(), predicate.isMatchCase()))
873          .append(op)
874          .append(toSQLValue(predicate.getKey(), predicate.getValue(), predicate.isMatchCase()))
875          .append(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR)
876          .append(
877              isSQLArray(predicate.getKey())
878                  ? String.format(IS_NOT_NULL_ARRAY_OPERATOR, column)
879                  : column + IS_NULL_OPERATOR)
880          .append(')');
881    } else {
882      builder
883          .append(toSQLField(predicate.getKey(), predicate.isMatchCase()))
884          .append(op)
885          .append(toSQLValue(predicate.getKey(), predicate.getValue(), predicate.isMatchCase()));
886    }
887  }
888
889  public void visitSimplePredicate(SimplePredicate<S> predicate, String op, String value)
890      throws QueryBuildingException {
891    if (sqlTermsMapper.includeNullInPredicate(predicate)) {
892      String column = SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLColumn(term(predicate.getKey()));
893      builder
894          .append('(')
895          .append(toSQLField(predicate.getKey(), predicate.isMatchCase()))
896          .append(op)
897          .append(toSQLValue(predicate.getKey(), value, predicate.isMatchCase()))
898          .append(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR)
899          .append(
900              isSQLArray(predicate.getKey())
901                  ? String.format(IS_NOT_NULL_ARRAY_OPERATOR, column)
902                  : column + IS_NULL_OPERATOR)
903          .append(')');
904    } else {
905      builder
906          .append(toSQLField(predicate.getKey(), predicate.isMatchCase()))
907          .append(op)
908          .append(toSQLValue(predicate.getKey(), value, predicate.isMatchCase()));
909    }
910  }
911
912  /** Determines if the parameter type is a Hive array. */
913  protected boolean isSQLArray(S parameter) {
914    return SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLType(term(parameter)).startsWith(SQL_ARRAY_PRE);
915  }
916
917  /** Term associated to a search parameter */
918  public Term term(S parameter) {
919    return sqlTermsMapper.term(parameter);
920  }
921
922  /** Creates a disjunction of all the given terms. */
923  private void appendTaxonFilterList(List<? extends Term> terms, String value) {
924    builder
925        .append('(')
926        .append(
927            terms.stream()
928                .map(term -> SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(term) + EQUALS_OPERATOR + value)
929                .collect(Collectors.joining(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR)))
930        .append(')');
931  }
932
933  /** Creates a disjunction of all the given terms. */
934  private void appendGadmFilterList(List<? extends Term> terms, String value) {
935    builder
936        .append('(')
937        .append(
938            terms.stream()
939                .map(
940                    term ->
941                        SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(term)
942                            + EQUALS_OPERATOR
943                            + "'"
944                            + value
945                            + "'")
946                .collect(Collectors.joining(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR)))
947        .append(')');
948  }
949
950  /**
951   * Searches any of the NUB keys in Hive of any rank, for multiple keys.
952   *
953   * @param taxonKeys to append as filter
954   */
955  private void appendTaxonKeyFilter(Collection<String> taxonKeys) {
956    builder.append('(');
957    boolean first = true;
958    for (Term term : NUB_KEYS) {
959      if (!first) {
960        builder.append(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
961      }
962      builder
963          .append(SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(term))
964          .append(IN_OPERATOR)
965          .append('(')
966          .append(COMMA_JOINER.join(taxonKeys))
967          .append(')');
968      first = false;
969    }
970    builder.append(')');
971  }
972
973  /**
974   * Searches every level of GADM GID in Hive for multiple keys.
975   *
976   * @param gadmGids to append as filter
977   */
978  private void appendGadmGidFilter(Collection<String> gadmGids) {
979    builder.append('(');
980    boolean first = true;
981    for (Term term : GADM_GIDS) {
982      if (!first) {
983        builder.append(DISJUNCTION_OPERATOR);
984      }
985      builder.append(SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(term)).append(IN_OPERATOR).append('(');
986      Iterator<String> iterator = gadmGids.iterator();
987      while (iterator.hasNext()) {
988        // Hardcoded GADM_LEVEL_0_GID since the type of all these parameters is the same.
989        // Using .toUpperCase() is safe, GIDs must be ASCII anyway.
990        builder.append(
991            toSQLValue(sqlTermsMapper.getDefaultGadmLevel(), iterator.next().toUpperCase(), true));
992        if (iterator.hasNext()) {
993          builder.append(", ");
994        }
995      }
996      builder.append(")");
997      first = false;
998    }
999    builder.append(')');
1000  }
1001
1002  /**
1003   * Searches any of the NUB keys in Hive of any rank.
1004   *
1005   * @param unaryOperator to append as filter
1006   */
1007  private void appendUnaryList(List<? extends Term> terms, String unaryOperator) {
1008    builder.append('(');
1009    builder.append(
1010        terms.stream()
1011            .map(term -> SQLColumnsUtils.getSQLQueryColumn(term) + unaryOperator)
1012            .collect(Collectors.joining(CONJUNCTION_OPERATOR)));
1013    builder.append(')');
1014  }
1015
1016  /**
1017   * Converts decimal range into a predicate with the form: field >= range.lower AND field <=
1018   * range.upper.
1019   */
1020  private Predicate toNumberRangePredicate(Range<Double> range, S key) {
1021    if (!range.hasLowerBound()) {
1022      return new LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<S>(
1023          key, String.valueOf(range.upperEndpoint().doubleValue()));
1024    }
1025    if (!range.hasUpperBound()) {
1026      return new GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<S>(
1027          key, String.valueOf(range.lowerEndpoint().doubleValue()));
1028    }
1029
1030    ImmutableList.Builder<Predicate> predicates =
1031        new ImmutableList.Builder<Predicate>()
1032            .add(
1033                new GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<S>(
1034                    key, String.valueOf(range.lowerEndpoint().doubleValue())))
1035            .add(
1036                new LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<S>(
1037                    key, String.valueOf(range.upperEndpoint().doubleValue())));
1038    return new ConjunctionPredicate(predicates.build());
1039  }
1040
1041  /**
1042   * Converts integer range into a predicate with the form: field >= range.lower AND field <=
1043   * range.upper.
1044   */
1045  private Predicate toIntegerRangePredicate(Range<Integer> range, S key) {
1046    if (!range.hasLowerBound()) {
1047      return new LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<S>(
1048          key, String.valueOf(range.upperEndpoint().intValue()));
1049    }
1050    if (!range.hasUpperBound()) {
1051      return new GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<S>(
1052          key, String.valueOf(range.lowerEndpoint().intValue()));
1053    }
1054
1055    ImmutableList<Predicate> predicates =
1056        new ImmutableList.Builder<Predicate>()
1057            .add(
1058                new GreaterThanOrEqualsPredicate<S>(
1059                    key, String.valueOf(range.lowerEndpoint().intValue())))
1060            .add(
1061                new LessThanOrEqualsPredicate<S>(
1062                    key, String.valueOf(range.upperEndpoint().intValue())))
1063            .build();
1064    return new ConjunctionPredicate(predicates);
1065  }
1066
1067  private void visit(Object object) throws QueryBuildingException {
1068    Method method = null;
1069    try {
1070      method = getClass().getMethod("visit", new Class[] {object.getClass()});
1071    } catch (NoSuchMethodException e) {
1072      log.warn(
1073          "Visit method could not be found. That means a unknown Predicate has been passed", e);
1074      throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown Predicate", e);
1075    }
1076    try {
1077      method.invoke(this, object);
1078    } catch (IllegalAccessException e) {
1079      log.error(
1080          "This error shouldn't occur if all visit methods are public. Probably a programming error",
1081          e);
1082      Throwables.propagate(e);
1083    } catch (InvocationTargetException e) {
1084      log.info("Exception thrown while building the query", e);
1085      throw new QueryBuildingException(e);
1086    }
1087  }
1088}
